projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: A personal portfolio website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS to showcase my projects, qualifications, and skills. Features a modern design with smooth animations and responsive layout.

projects.title: Quai network
projects.desc: The frontend was developed using React.js along with Next.js for server-side rendering and routing.I was in charge of front-end development.

projects.title: Cloud
projects.desc: The site features smooth scroll effects, responsive layout, and a visually immersive experience designed to engage users through strong visual storytelling.I was in charge of front-end development.

projects.title: 3D miniapp game
projects.desc: A Carwar miniapp built with Next.js, TailwindCSS and Blender. This project is currently in development. You can see the growth of our project

projects.title: Flappy Bee Dapp
projects.desc: ​A Flappy Bee DApp, is a decentralized application (Dapp) that combines classic arcade style gameplay with blockchain technology.

projects.title: Flappyboss
projects.desc: FlappyBoss is a browser-based game built with React and deployed on Vercel. It uses modern web technologies for smooth performance, fast loading, and cross-device compatibility.

projects.title: Lovely swap
projects.desc: Lovely Swap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) where users can trade crypto tokens on networks like BNB Chain, Polygon, and Base. It’s part of the Lovely Finance ecosystem.

projects.title: Q3faucet bot
projects.desc: This bot is designed to help users easily receive test tokens for the O3 Layer blockchain network. These tokens can be used to explore and interact with the platform without the need for real funds.
